name: Slimeventure (rachelquijano)
description: Welcome to Slimeventure! A world of peaceful slimes to explore and make new friends! At least, that's what it used to be. Invasive species have taken over several regions of the peaceful world, and the slimes are struggling to survive! It is up to YOU to take on the journey of driving off the invasive species back to their habitat and restore the world to how it was before! But you don't know how you'll be able to achieve that, so you initially reject the idea. But as a terrifying event occurs in your life, your perspective suddenly switches, and you begin on your grand adventure! Throughout the journey, you will meet friend and foe alike, and you'll learn new skills that you'll need to explore the continuing worlds ahead. Are you up for the challenge? Obstacles, puzzles, boss fights, Slimeventure has it all! But beware, sometimes, things may not be as easy as they seem. Help your species from extinction, be the hero that they need!
